==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|らん|ぼう|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
From ''ran'' ([[乱]], [[disordered]], [[confused]], [[chaotic]]) + ''bō'' ([[暴]], acting with [[destructive]] force)

===Adjectival noun===
{{ja-adj|infl=na|らんぼう}}

# [[rude]], [[violent]], [[rough]], [[disorderly]], [[lawless]], [[unreasonable]], [[reckless]]

====Inflection====
{{ja-na|らんぼう}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|らんぼう}}

# [[violence]], [[outrage]], [[roughness]]
# [[rape]]

====Derived terms====
* {{l|ja|乱暴者}} (''ranbōmono''): thug, hooligan
* {{l|ja|乱暴狼藉}} (''ranbōrōzeki''): running amuck

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|tr=intrans|らんぼう}}

# be [[rude]], [[roughhouse]], act [[violent]]ly or [[reckless]]ly

{{ja-suru|らんぼう}}
